pkgmetadata.longdescription: 'Rcpp' Integration for 'CGAL' // Creates a header only package to link to the 'CGAL' (Computational Geometry Algorithms Library) header files in 'Rcpp'. There are a variety of potential uses for the software such as Hilbert sorting, K-D Tree nearest neighbors, and convex hull algorithms. For more information about how to use the header files, see the 'CGAL' documentation at https://www.cgal.org. Currently downloads version 6.0.1 of the 'CGAL' header files.
